list.name: Replica started
list.rawQuery:
SELECT
  extract(epoch from time_column) AS time,
  text_column as text,
  tags_column as tags
FROM
  metric_table
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time_column)

targets.expr:
label_replace(  
  quantile by (ic_subnet, op, type) (
    0.5,
    storage_layer_write_bytes{job="replica",ic="$ic",ic_subnet=~"$ic_subnet",instance=~"$instance"} - storage_layer_write_bytes offset $period > 0
  ),
  "ic_subnet", "$1", "ic_subnet", "([a-z0-9]+)-.*"
)

label_replace(  
  quantile by (ic_subnet, op, type) (
    0.5,
    state_manager_merge_estimated_storage_savings_bytes_sum{job="replica",ic="$ic",ic_subnet=~"$ic_subnet",instance=~"$instance"} - state_manager_merge_estimated_storage_savings_bytes_sum offset $period > 0
  ),
  "ic_subnet", "$1", "ic_subnet", "([a-z0-9]+)-.*"
)

panels.description:
The total memory usage of all canisters combined.

This is the logical memory and is not necessarily kept in RAM.
panels.title: Total canister memory
Number of files by shard heatmap

panels.description: Over-approximation of the RAM used for storing dirty Wasm pages until the next checkpoint.
panels.title: Current heap delta
